metadata.description: Conjured from the pages of Legend of Isis, Bluewater introduces its newest female force --- Cleopatra! From the swirling mists of time, emerges an ancient queen besieged by a host of modern problems. The clock is ticking as Cleo and her hard as nails bodyguard, Tony, discover a murderous plot by a mysterious threat. Meanwhile, a demented killer makes his presence know in the bowels of the city.
metadata.name: Tony And Cleo
